post.author: Brendan
post.content:
I have a client looking for intermediate java developers for a 5-6 month contract located downtown (near union station).  The technical requirements are below;


- 3-5 year's experience, intermediate Java developer

- working experience in delivery of web applications with Jakarta Struts MVC framework (other Java web frameworks would be considered)

- Good understanding of XML, XML Schemas

- Good understanding of HTML, JSP, web presentation concepts

- Use of Junit and other unit testing tools for web applications


Regards,

Stephanie

stephanie@people-exchange.com
post.title: Intermediate java developer - Cont, Toronto
